reviews.review_msg: AVOID THIS PROF. WAY TOO MUCH WORK FOR A THREE CREDIT CLASS AND ONLY HIS OPINIONS ARE VALID.
Exams are all written and not enough time to write them. Too many mini assignments that take time but are only worth a mark or two each. Nice professor over all.

Stephen is amazing! I would recommend his classes solely on his ability to lecture. There are weekly required readings and he requires three key concepts for each reading on canvas. His class has a lot of weekly work but it is not difficult. The term paper is 15 pages and his exams are all written with definitions, a short answer and an essay.

Makes you think critically and brainwashes you with his points of view. Be prepared to read 50+ pages weekly and receive 1 mark for writing key concepts from each reading required. Too much work if you're looking for an easy A but Stephen gives solid lectures and is passionate about the material he teaches. Would not take this prof again.

Mr. Buckley is an engaging instructor and knows how to teach material and get students to understand it. With that being said, his courses are highly ideological and don't explore viewpoints other than his own. He looks at labour issues though a very left wing lens. If you let him indoctrinate you will do well in his courses.
